snippet: Nearly the entire town of Darrington packed into the community center to pay their respects to Linda McPherson, who was among the first of the 30 victims of the landslide to be identified.
abstract: Long procession of funerals for victims of Oso, Wash, landslide begins; nearly entire town of Darrington packs into community center to pay their respects to Linda McPherson, who was among the first of the 30 victims of the landslide to be identified.
lead_paragraph: Nearly the entire town of Darrington packed into the community center to pay their respects to Linda McPherson, who was among the first of the 30 victims of the landslide to be identified.

headline.main: As Town Mourns an Educator, It Celebrates a Close-Knit Community
headline.print_headline: As Town Mourns an Educator, It Celebrates a Close-Knit Community
